rows.label: tev014801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev014801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Fritz about the residents of NLA.

rows.label: tev014801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev014801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Fritz about recent developments.

rows.label: tev014801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Fritz how to buy equipment.

rows.label: tev014801_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Fritz about recent developments.

rows.label: tev014801_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Fritz about the arms manufacturers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Fritz if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev014801_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Fritz about weapons dropped by indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_SEL2031
rows.name: Ask Fritz about Meredith & Co.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_SEL2051
rows.name: Ask Fritz about Candid & Credible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_SEL2052
rows.name: Ask Fritz if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev014801_SEL2071
rows.name: Ask Fritz about the Nopon Commerce Guild.

rows.label: tev014801_SEL2091
rows.name: Ask Fritz about Orphean Technologies.

rows.label: tev014801_SEL2111
rows.name: Ask Fritz about Six Stars.

rows.label: tev014801_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Fritz about recent developments.

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0001
rows.name:
The city's economy has finally sprung to life,
and customers are swarming to Armory Alley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0002
rows.name:
I must admit, I worried about our future when we were
attacked by an unknown enemy and had to crash-land
on this dangerous world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0003
rows.name:
But humans are tenacious creatures. It's hard not to
appreciate that when you see the level of energy on
display here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0004
rows.name:
But I'd rather be a part of this than a mere observer,
so I'd better get to work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0009
rows.name: Did you see the director general's broadcast earlier?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0010
rows.name: Apparently they've discovered 10 new crew members![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0011
rows.name:
At this rate, the survey of Mira that's been stalled
for so long will probably be able to resume soon.
That sure was a relief to hear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0018
rows.name:
If you join BLADE, you'll be able to use the shop
terminal in Armory Alley to buy armaments from
the city's various arms manufacturers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0019
rows.name:
And once you acquire a Skell license, you'll be able to
buy Skells from there as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0020
rows.name:
When that happy day comes, I hope you'll consider
buying one of the high-quality Skells from my company,
Sakuraba Industries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0026
rows.name:
The arms manufacturers have been asked to prioritize
new weapons development, but that sort of work
requires resources and money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0027
rows.name:
And there aren't any large investors in New LA,
so we have to seek capital and miranium from
individual BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0028
rows.name:
The amounts of investment provided by each is small,
but merge enough small streams and you end up with
a mighty river! At least, that's what we're counting on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG0029
rows.name:
If you join BLADE, I hope you'll considering investing
in your preferred arms manufacturers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1001
rows.name: Each arms manufacturer has a corporation level.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1002
rows.name:
As that rises, they'll be able to develop and sell
progressively better equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1003
rows.name:
...Hmm? You want to know what makes a corporate
level rise?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1004
rows.name:
Well, it's based on the degree to which you BLADEs
use a company's equipment. Using them in combat
promotes the products to a wider audience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1005
rows.name:
As a BLADE, you should battle using the equipment of
the manufacturers you wish to support. That will cause
their corporate level to gradually rise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1006
rows.name:
You can increase it much more quickly by using the
AM terminal in Armory Alley to contribute miranium
to a favored arms manufacturer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1007
rows.name:
Miranium is a valuable resource. With plenty on hand,
development can proceed at a significantly faster pace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1012
rows.name:
Sometimes the weapons that emerge from a fallen
indigen's belly possess strange properties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1013
rows.name:
I work in sales, not development, so I couldn't begin to
explain the how or why of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG1014
rows.name:
But I think it has something to do with the strange
chemical reactions that go on inside their bodies that
allow indigens to shoot lasers and...things like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2001
rows.name:
At the moment, New LA hosts two arms manufacturers:
My company, Sakuraba Industries, and our rival,
the Grenada Galactic Group.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2002
rows.name:
We at Sakuraba Industries pride ourselves on making
high-quality, conventional armaments that excel at
physical damage and defense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2003
rows.name:
On the other hand, GGG primarily focuses on creating
armaments that employ a special beam coating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2004
rows.name:
Obviously, I would recommend that you mainly
purchase Sakuraba products! But your safety is,
of course, always the highest priority.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2005
rows.name:
Therefore, I suggest you compare the wares of both
companies, then purchase the ones that will be most
effective against the enemies you expect to face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2010
rows.name: They're a recently registered start-up arms manufacturer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2011
rows.name:
They seem to be developing weaponry that employs
Ganglion technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2012
rows.name:
In fact, they're even designed to look similar to the
equipment employed by enemy xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2013
rows.name:
Their armor seems sturdy, and has unique attributes
that weren't available on conventional equipment.
It's really quite something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2014
rows.name:
If you're interested, why not take a look at the
shop terminal in Armory Alley?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2020
rows.name:
Their weaponry uses highly advanced electric-
attribute technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2021
rows.name:
That makes them particularly effective against fish-like
piscinoid indigens who live near water, as well as the
Ganglion's automated weaponry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2022
rows.name:
They may be a rival, but there's no denying their
technical prowess when it comes to harnessing and
controlling extreme amounts of electricity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2023
rows.name:
I suppose we shouldn't be surprised. After all, this is a
race of xenoforms that was cruising the galaxy long
before we humans fired our first rocket into space.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2024
rows.name:
As a BLADE, you should give them a try.
I think you'll be impressed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2025
rows.name:
Do you know why destroying enemy appendages refills
your Skell's fuel supply?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2026
rows.name:
...That look on your face tells me that you don't.
And to be honest, I don't either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2027
rows.name:
I asked a mechanic about it so that I could speak more
knowledgeably about our products, but his answer was
so technical that I couldn't understand a word of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2028
rows.name:
Maybe it's enough to just remember that it's true:
Destroying appendages refills your fuel supply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2030
rows.name:
The weapons that the Nopon Commerce Guild deals in
seem positively adorable, but make no mistake...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2031
rows.name:
They are deadly weapons that typically use extreme
heat to incinerate their targets into dust![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2032
rows.name:
The Nopon are so tiny, they're often eaten by the Prone
as food.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2033
rows.name:
Yet if they were simply strong enough to wield their
own weapons, they could have turned the tables on
the Prone long ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2040
rows.name:
They develop high-tech weaponry that we aren't even
capable of comprehending with our current level of
technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2041
rows.name:
Their product line includes equipment developed with
advanced ether technology, as well as close-combat
weapons that deal damage with gravitational waves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2042
rows.name:
When the Orphe were imprisoned by the Ganglion,
they were apparently forced to make weapons for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2043
rows.name:
And if you wield an Orphean Technologies weapon,
you'll understand why the Ganglion sought them out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2049
rows.name:
Six Stars employs many skilled Wrothian artisans to
make a variety of unique arms that only they know
how to craft.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2050
rows.name:
They are designed by Wrothians and for Wrothians,
and I'm told that they can be somewhat challenging
for mere humans to wield.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2051
rows.name:
Nevertheless, the destructive power that they unleash
upon a successful strike is truly eye-opening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2052
rows.name:
If you supplement your accuracy with skills and battle
traits, a Six Star weapon can be a potent companion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG2053
rows.name:
Incidentally, "Six Stars" is some Wrothian cultural
allusion, and is not intended to imply that their
weapons are superior to Sakuraba's five-star offerings![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG3001
rows.name:
You know, I haven't seen Avi around lately.
She used to be one of my most regular customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG3002
rows.name:
It sounded like she was having a hard time at work.
Maybe she ended up quitting her job?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG3003
rows.name:
Well, whether she's started at some new job or is just
working hard hours at her old one, I hope she's found
some happiness in life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014801_MSG3004
rows.name:
It would be a shame to see all of her hard work go
unrewarded.[ST:wait ]
